import{toast}from"react-toastify";// notifications
export var SUCCES="succes";export var ERROR="error";export var CLEAR="clear";export var showToast=function showToast(type,message){switch(type){case ERROR:toast.error(message,{position:toast.POSITION.BOTTOM_RIGHT});break;case SUCCES:toast.success(message,{position:toast.POSITION.BOTTOM_RIGHT});break;default:return false;}};
